mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.perms FROM levelSchool.sys_user_role ur left join levelSchool.sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left JOIN levelSchool.sys_menu sm on rm.menu_id = sm.id where sm.perms is not null
select ur.* from levelSchool.sys_role_menu rm left join levelSchool.sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where rm.menu_id = #{menuId}
SELECT distinct rm.menu_id FROM levelSchool.sys_user_role ur left join levelSchool.sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where rm.menu_id is not null
